Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.animations

Class MyShelfieAnimation.Builder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.animations.MyShelfieAnimation.Builder
Enclosing class:
MyShelfieAnimation
public static class MyShelfieAnimation.Builder extends Object
Static enclosing class to construct the chain of animations to apply at a node

    • buildAnimation

      public javafx.animation.Transition buildAnimation(@NotNull javafx.scene.Node node) throws NullPointerException
      Construct and retrieve the chain of animations built as specified
      Parameters:
      node - the node on which the animations will be applied
      Returns:
      the resulting transition composed with all transitions specified with the addAnimation(...) method, and the logic specified with setCombineLogic(...)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if no animation is specified for the animation's chain
      See Also:
      • setCombineLogic(String combineLogic)
      • setCombineLogic(MyShelfieAnimationCombineLogic combineLogic)

    • playMyShelfieAnimation

      public void playMyShelfieAnimation(javafx.scene.Node node) throws NullPointerException
      Combine and start the resulting animation obtained from the chain composed with the addAnimation(...) method, and the logic specified with setCombineLogic(...)
      Parameters:
      node - the node on which the animations will be applied
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if no animation is specified for the animation's chain

    • playMyShelfieAnimation

      public void playMyShelfieAnimation(javafx.scene.Node node, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> onFinishedAction) throws NullPointerException
      Combine and start the resulting animation obtained from the chain composed with the addAnimation(...) method, and the logic specified with setCombineLogic(...)
      Parameters:
      node - the node on which the animations will be applied
      onFinishedAction - the action to be executed when the animation reaches the end
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if no animation is specified for the animation's chain
